item.description:
Andres Douglas, founder of Bako.do, presents django-tastypie-nonrel https://github.com/andresdouglas/django-tastypie-nonrel This is an extension of django-tastypie (https://github.com/toastdriven/django-tastypie/) to support django-nonrel (http://www.allbuttonspressed.com/projects/django-nonrel) the fork of django with nonrelational backends, and MongoDB in particular. It should proof useful when Django 1.4 incorporates non-relational backends. Still under development.

Pizza and beer thanks to Locu, a hot new startup that is currently hiring Django developers! http://locu.com/#Jobs

After the talk, we'll have a drink at Drink, 348 Congress St, Boston.
item.name: Andres Douglas presents django-tastypie-nonrel
